DOC.brief_summary: To collect the efficacy and safety information of fluconazole on infant subjects related to their appropriate use in daily practice.
DOC.brief_title: Diflucan Research For Infant Evaluation Of Antifungal Treatment And Prophylaxis Medication
DOC.criteria: Male or Female under age of seven patients who are prescribed fluconazole (Diflucan) for antifungal treatment or prophylaxis administration. Subject of seven years or more who have been prescribed fluconazole.
